Big post for ALL of my characters.

Sinesis and Sinister are still getting =
repaired, so is Lightmare, even though she'll be out soon because she recie=
ved minimal damage.

Stranato walks around to the base and starts to repair=
 it quickly. He taunts everyone else the whole time.

Train Wreck is called=
 into another room by Airbomber.

"We have to do something about Stranato, =
what are we going to do with only 3 Radicons?" Airbomber asked.

"I've been=
 concocting a plan to get us all back together again, it should work, even =
on a guy like Stranato." Train Wreck said. Airbomber nodded and they both w=
alked out of the room.

Stronghold and Scamrock are repaired and quickly le=
ave, leaving Arrow, who is still being repaired, in the People's Base and t=
aking off through the hidden path in the swamp.

Dracona chases Gangon and =
in a short time catches up with him.

"Why are you coming in our base? Don'=
t you have a team to go home to?" Dracona asked.

"I did, but I left when m=
y love...I mean BrightBlade started to ignore me." Gangon said. Dracona sat=
 him down and he told his whole story. Dracona took Gangon back to the Maxi=
mal base.

"We'll sort out your problems, don't worry, just give me time, t=
hey don't call me a genius for nothing!" Dracona wasn't lying, she was supe=
r intelligent. Gangon smiled a little and followed Dracona.

Plintissa grow=
led at Stranato and sat down. Plintissa started to repair the base slowly b=
ut surely. Stranato was going fast, and thought he was doing good but he re=
ally was doing a terrible job. Plintissa sighed and continued her repair jo=
b to the Ark. Artist came dancing over and stopped in front of Iron Raptor.=


"I am here to save the world and the Maximal and Autobot kind!" Artist sa=
id. Artist stared at Iron Raptor, stared at Iron Raptor with those eyes. Th=
ose piercing eyes that were accused of murder by Ramhorn. Iron Raptor shoul=
d easily be able to tell who this bot is all by reconizing the stare and th=
e eyes...
